    right="Feat 5"

>
[Halfling Weapon Trickster](/Feats.aspx?ID=61) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 53 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Halfling Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=55)

</column>

---

You are particularly adept at fighting with your people's favored weapons. Whenever you critically succeed at an attack roll using a [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), a [sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72), or a [halfling](/Traits.aspx?ID=87) weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Halfling Weapon Trickster
